definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子过紧的话，会加快脱发的速度。

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: We will accelerate the development of human resources.
Driven by the new technology revolution, economic globalization has picked up speed.
sentences.chinese: 在新技术革命的推动下，经济全球化进程加快。

sentences.english: We will accelerate reforms of county and township government institutions.
sentences.chinese: 加快推进县乡机构等配套改革。

sentences.english: When it ticks faster, we can process more.
sentences.chinese: 被喀答声加快以后，我们可以处理更多的信息。

sentences.english: This proactive alert enables you to accelerate the recovery from downtimes.
sentences.chinese: 这种积极主动的提醒，您可以加快恢复停工。

sentences.english: The cars got up speed on the straight.
sentences.chinese: 汽车直驶时加快了速度。

sentences.english: Liaising and expediting approval of the quotation with the client.
sentences.chinese: 联系客户，并加快对客户报价的审批。

sentences.english: Such advance studies can greatly expedite regulatory approval.
sentences.chinese: 这种预先研究可以大大加快管制审批。

sentences.english: The car really opened up when being on the expressway.
sentences.chinese: 一上高速路，车子就真正加快速度了。

sentences.english: Speeding up development of Dalian Northeast Asian International Shipping Centre.
sentences.chinese: 加快发展大连东北亚国际航运中心。

sentences.english: Raise the voltage and the bar vibrates faster.
sentences.chinese: 提高电压，硅条震动加快。

sentences.english: Speed up boot time by disabling unused ports on your Windows machine.
sentences.chinese: 停用你机器上的无用的接口使电脑运行速度加快。

sentences.english: The aging trend will quicken in the next century.
sentences.chinese: 到下世纪初韩国人口老龄化进程将进一步加快。

sentences.english: Departments at all levels should ensure that respective tasks will be completed by the end of this year.
sentences.chinese: 各级各部门要加快进度，确保全面完成今年建设任务。

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to increase the specified cruising speed/to pick up speed/to speed up
to intensify/to speed up/to step up
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
